name: Swim Classes: Level 2
description: This class builds on the basic aquatic skills and water safety skills and concepts learned in level 1. Participants begin to perform skills at a slightly more advanced level and begin gaining rudimentary propulsive skills on both the front and the back. This level marks the beginning of independent aquatic locomotion skills. Prerequisite- Completion of Level 1. Registration is limited to one swim class per participant. Children must be 48" to participate.

howToGetIt: If this is a Drop-In program, please go to the meeting location at the activity start time. For additional questions, please contact the pool directly at (415) 831- 6805.
